Quality Workmanship - Reliable Service - Family Run

Style that hits home

With over 40 years of experience in the upholstery trade, Zone Upholstery offer a personal service, truly taking into account your needs and requirements when undertaking upholstery work on your behalf. Many of our clients have very specific ideas and we want to make their dreams become reality. Free quotations are available on all projects, so get in touch with our team today to discuss your ideas.

Turning your ideas into reality

We pride ourselves on providing an exceptional service for all domestic and commercial clients. Whether you are looking for someone to upholster new furniture, reupholster old furniture or resize existing furniture, our experienced team can help. From hotel seating to caravan upholstery, if you have an idea, we can make it happen.

Commercial

Commercial reupholstery will save your business money in the long run and is the cost effective and environmentally friendly way to change the look of your furniture.

Foam Cut To Size

Over time foam products in sofas and seating can sag and become uncomfortable. The experts at Zone Upholstery can replace this foam at a fraction of the cost of buying new furniture or cushions.

Reupholstery services for domestic clients

Give your furniture a new lease of life when you choose reupholstery services from Zone Upholstery in Manchester. Old furniture is often better built, more sturdy and higher quality than mass produced furniture nowadays, so before choosing to discard it and buy new, why not think about reupholstering it?

Foam cut to size in Manchester

Zone Upholstery have been supplying customers with foam cut to size for over 40 years. We are one of the leading companies in Manchester for foam replacement so you are in good hands. If you need replacement foam products for your sofa, caravan or cushions, we are the company to call. Our large portfolio of previous customers often spread the word about how happy they are with our service, so why not find out for yourself?

Testimonials

Wallowing in comfort

Gary has an extensive Library of sample fabrics from different manufacturers enabling a choice to suit. We decided that comfort was our main aim and went for a vintage Parker Knoll three seat settee, a PK York chair, a PK Hartley chair, a Halo French flea market chair plus a long low footstool would do the trick. Arm covers for all seats were made to help wear and to keep clean. Gary is prepared to work with you to meet your needs, which in our case included firmer cushions on the settee and extra lumbar support for the York chair. We are well pleased with the service. Gary worked to the timetable which he set and we are now '' wallowing in comfort'' on our smart newly upholstered suite. Thanks. Eric and Pat.

A credit to the reupholstery industry

Zone Upholstery have recently reupholstered our 3 piece suite and six dining chairs which was originally hand made by them. This suite is now 14 years old and was so well made that we opted to up-cycle and have the cushions reupholstered and new foam. They have made an amazing job and it looks stunning, was excellent value for money and completed on time as promised. The customer service we received was exceptional; nothing was too much trouble. They are a credit to their industry and we have no hesitation in recommending them. We will definitely return for repeat business, in fact we would not go anywhere else!

Why Choose Re-Upholstery?

Domestic Reupholstery

Our personal service is one reason why our customers return to us time and time again. We have a wide range of fabrics and leather for you to choose from, giving you the option to stick with your original theme or completely change the look of your furniture. Reupholstering is a fantastic way to refresh existing furniture and is also better for the environment. Have you been looking in the shops for a new piece of furniture but just can't find the exact one piece you want? Our reupholstery services are suitable for new items of furniture too! Why compromise on the fabric or colour when you could have exactly what you want? Call Zone Upholstery today for a quotation and to discuss your options.

With options available for both indoor and outdoor furniture, the possibilities are endless.

Getting that sinking feeling from your seating?

Foam Cut To Size

Over time foam products in sofas and seating can sag and become uncomfortable. The experts at Zone Upholstery can replace this foam at a fraction of the cost of buying new furniture or cushions. With a wide variety of density foams available including firm, extra firm and soft, we are sure to have something to suit your needs. Is your item of furniture an awkward shape? Our team can cut foam to meet your sizing requirements no matter how big or small, so please get in touch with your requests today.

Zone Upholstery
